001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model;
002
003import android.graphics.Rect;
004import java.util.LinkedList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.ListIterator;
007import java.util.Random;
008
009/**
010 * Represents the game field where gameplay occurs. Manages game elements such as the ship, enemies,
011 * and meteors.
012 */
013public class GameField {
014
015  private static final int ENEMY_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER = 3;
016  private static final double TIMING_OFFSET = 0.8;
017  private static final double TIMING_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER = 0.007;
018  private static final double BASED_METEOR_PROBABILITY = 0.01;
019
020  private double secondsPerTick;
021  private Rect boundingBox;
022  private Ship ship;
023  private Meteor meteor;
024  private Enemy enemy;
025  private Random rng;
026  private int level;
027  private int counter;
028  private double velocity;
029  private double gravity;
030  private int angle;
031  private int levelEnemiesRemoved;
032  private int collision;
033  private int meteorOut;
034  private Projectile projectile;
035  private List<Meteor> meteors;
036  private List<Enemy> enemies;
037  private List<Enemy> enemiesDestroyed;
038  private List<Meteor> meteorDestroyed;
039
040  /**
041   * Constructs a GameField object with the specified dimensions.
042   *
043   * @param x The width of the game field.
044   * @param y The height of the game field.
045   */
046  public GameField(int x, int y) {
047    this.level = 0;
048    this.counter = 0;
049    boundingBox = new Rect(0, 0, x, y);
050    ship = new Ship(this, 150, 80);
051    enemiesDestroyed = new LinkedList<>();
052    meteorDestroyed = new LinkedList<>();
053    meteors = new LinkedList<>();
054    enemies = new LinkedList<>();
055    rng = new Random();
056  }
057
058
059  /**
060   * Retrieves the ship object within the game field.
061   *
062   * @return The Ship object representing the player's ship.
063   */
064  public Ship getShip() {
065    return ship;
066  }
067
068//  public int getCollision() {
069//    return collision;
070//  }
071
072  /**
073   * Retrieves the projectile object within the game field.
074   *
075   * @return The Projectile object.
076   */
077  public Projectile getProjectile() {
078    return projectile;
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Retrieves the bounding box of the object.
083   *
084   * @return The Rect object representing the bounding box of the game field.
085   */
086  public Rect getBoundingBox() {
087    return boundingBox;
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Retrieves the level.
092   *
093   * @return int number of the currently level.
094   */
095  public int getLevel() {
096    return level;
097  }
098
099
100  /**
101   * Retrieves the counter of enemies destroyed.
102   *
103   * @return int number of enemies destroyed.
104   */
105  public int getCounter() {
106    return counter;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Retrieves the gravity selected by user in the UI.
111   *
112   * @return representation of gravity in the format of double.
113   */
114  public double getGravity() {
115    return gravity;
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Sets the gravitational force affecting game elements.
120   *
121   * @param gravity The value representing the gravitational force.
122   */
123  public void setGravity(double gravity) {
124    this.gravity = gravity;
125  }
126
127  /**
128   * Retrieves the list of meteors present within the game field.
129   *
130   * @return A List of Meteor objects representing the meteors in the game field.
131   */
132  public List<Meteor> getMeteors() {
133    return meteors;
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Retrieves the list of enemies present within the game field.
138   *
139   * @return A List of Enemy objects representing the enemies in the game field.
140   */
141  public List<Enemy> getEnemies() {
142    return enemies;
143  }

153  /**
154   * Sets the velocity of the projectile based on user selection.
155   *
156   * @param velocity The value representing the velocity of the projectile.
157   */
158  public void setVelocity(double velocity) {
159    this.velocity = velocity;
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * Sets the angle of the projectile based on user selection.
164   *
165   * @param angle The value representing the angle of the projectile.
166   */
167  public void setAngle(int angle) {
168    this.angle = angle;
169  }
170
171  /**
172   * Starts a game session at the specified level.
173   *
174   * @param level The level at which to start the game session.
175   */
176  public void start(int level) {
177    //level = 1;
178    this.level = level;
179    computeTiming();
180    // FIXME: 11/22/23 If I want more enemies multiply by level.
181    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
182      addEnemies();
183    }
184    addMeteor();
185
186  }
187

190//    ship.setAngle(angle);       // FIXME: 11/9/23 Input from user.
191//    ship.setGravity(gravity);   // FIXME: 11/9/23 This shouldn't be here.
192//    projectile = ship.fire();
193//  }
194
195
196  /**
197   * Updates game elements, handles collisions, and manages game state. - Updates the meteor list
198   * and enemy list. - Checks if the enemy list is empty and adds more enemies to the game field. -
199   * Checks if the projectile intersects an enemy, removing the enemy from the list and the game
200   * field. - Checks if any meteor intersects with the ship, leading to the ship's destruction and
201   * game over.
202   */
203  public void update() {
204    for (Meteor meteor : meteors) {
205      meteor.updatePosition(level);
206    }
207    //System.out.println(gravity); // FIXME: 11/17/23 Test for gravity changes.
208    meteorDestroyed.clear();
209    enemiesDestroyed.clear();
210    for (ListIterator<Meteor> iterator = meteors.listIterator(); iterator.hasNext(); ) {
211      Meteor meteor = iterator.next();
212      // TODO: 11/13/23 Meteors update position
213      if (ship.intersects(meteor.getMeteorBox())) {
214        // TODO: 11/13/23 damage the ship/ change gravity.
215        collision++;
216        ship = null;
217        meteorDestroyed.add(meteor);
218        iterator.remove();
219        break;
220      }
221    }
222    if (rng.nextDouble() < BASED_METEOR_PROBABILITY * level / 2) {
223      addMeteor();
224    }
225    if (projectile != null) {
226      projectile.updatePosition();
227
228      if (projectile.getPositionY() >= boundingBox.bottom
229          || projectile.getPositionX() >= boundingBox.right) {
230        projectile = null;
231      } else {
232        for (ListIterator<Enemy> iterator = enemies.listIterator(); iterator.hasNext(); ) {
233          Enemy enemy = iterator.next();
234          if (projectile.intersects(enemy.getEnemyBox())) {
235            enemiesDestroyed.add(enemy);
236            counter++;
237            projectile = null;
238            updateLevel();
239            iterator.remove();
240            break;
241          }
242        }
243        if (enemies.isEmpty()) {
244          for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
245            addEnemies();
246          }
247        }
248      }
249    }
250  }
251
252
253  /**
254   * Moves the ship upwards. Invokes the ship's movement method to move upward within the game
255   * field.
256   */
257  public void shipMoveUp() {
258    ship.moveUp();
259  }
260
261  /**
262   * Moves the ship downwards. Invokes the ship's movement method to move downward within the game
263   * field.
264   */
265  public void shipMoveDown() {
266    ship.moveDown();
267  }
268
269  /**
270   * Initiates the shooting action of the ship. - Sets the gravity, angle, and velocity of the
271   * projectile fired by the ship. - Fires the projectile from the ship.
272   */
273  public void shoot() {
274    ship.setGravity(this.gravity);
275    ship.setAngle(this.angle);
276    ship.setVelocity(this.velocity);
277    ship.fire();
278    projectile = ship.fire();
279  }
280
281  /**
282   * Adds a meteor to the game field while preventing intersection with existing meteors.
283   */
284  public void addMeteor() {
285    boolean intersection;
286    Meteor meteor = new Meteor(this,
287        boundingBox.right - 20,
288        boundingBox.top + rng.nextInt(
289            boundingBox.height()));
290
291    do {
292      intersection = false;
293      for (Meteor m : meteors) {
294        if (m.inside(meteor.getMeteorBox())) {
295          intersection = true;
296          meteor.setyPosition(boundingBox.top + rng.nextInt(boundingBox.height()));
297          break;
298        }
299      }
300    } while (intersection);
301
302    meteors.add(meteor);
303  }
304
305  /**
306   * Adds an enemy to the game field while preventing intersection with existing enemies.
307   */
308  public void addEnemies() {
309    boolean intersection;
310    Enemy enemy;
311    do {
312      intersection = false;
313//      enemy.setyPosition(
314//          rng.nextInt());
315      enemy = new Enemy(this, boundingBox.top + rng.nextInt(boundingBox.height()),
316          boundingBox.left + boundingBox.width() / 2 + rng.nextInt((boundingBox.width() / 2)));
317      for (Enemy nmy : enemies) {
318        if (nmy.inside(enemy.getEnemyBox())) {
319          intersection = true;
320          break;
321        }
322      }
323    } while (intersection);
324    enemies.add(enemy);
325  }
326

334
335
336  /**
337   * Updates the game level, enemy count, and object velocities based on gameplay progression.
338   * Increases the level when the number of enemies destroyed reaches 3 times the current level.
339   * Adjusts object velocities depending on the updated level.
340   */
341  private void updateLevel() {
342    levelEnemiesRemoved += 1;
343    if (levelEnemiesRemoved >= (ENEMY_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER * level)) {
344      level++;
345      computeTiming();
346      levelEnemiesRemoved = 0;
347    }
348  }
349
350
351  /**
352   * Checks if the game is over based on specific conditions.
353   *
354   * @return {@code true} if the game is over; {@code false} otherwise. The game is considered over
355   * when the ship object is null and the level is greater than zero.
356   */
357  public boolean isGameOver() {
358    return level > 0 && ship == null;
359  }

379
380  private void computeTiming() {
381    secondsPerTick = Math.pow(TIMING_OFFSET - (level - 1) * TIMING_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER, level - 1);
382  }
383
384}
